document.full_text: tyler hansbrough scored a career-high 29 points, dahntay jones added 18 as the indiana pacers snapped a six-game losing streak with a victory over the knicks.
document.title: pacers 106, knicks 93: hansbrough scores 29 as pacers rout knicks
lines_and_colors: tyler hansbrough scored a career-high 29 points, dahntay jones added 18 as the indiana pacers snapped a six-game losing streak with a victory over the knicks.
